gcci.text: Sustained H100 spot prices around $3.20/hr indicate supply constraints remain tight despite expanded capacity, keeping AI hardware capex elevated.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek’s $1.25/1M input-token pricing is intensifying API price wars and pushing model designs toward higher efficiency.

gagl.text: A 120 TWh AI electricity load can rival the annual consumption of a mid-sized nation, increasing grid strain and favoring flexible generation and nuclear baseload.

aipi.text: Rapid API price compression alongside rising energy demand and capex intensity signals a maturing market with bubble risk if growth and margins diverge.
